doc:
Betsy Blair https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Betsy_Blair 0 Betsy Blair (December 11, 1923 – March 13, 2009) was an American actress of film and stage, long based in London. Blair pursued a career in entertainment from the age of eight, and as a child worked as an amateur dancer, performed on radio, and worked as a model, before joining the chorus of Billy Rose's Diamond Horseshoe in 1940. There she met Gene Kelly; they were married the following year, when she was seventeen years old, and divorced sixteen years later in 1957. After work in the theatre, Blair began her film career playing supporting roles in films such as A Double Life (1947) and Another Part of the Forest (1948). Her interest in Marxism led to an investigation by the House Un-American Activities Committee and Blair was blacklisted for some time, but resumed her career with a critically acclaimed performance in Marty (1955) for which she was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress. She continued her career with regular theatre, film and television, mainly in Europe, work until the mid-1990s. Betsy_Blair ( December_11_,_1923 – March_13_,_2009 ) was an_American_actress of film_and_stage , long based in London . Blair pursued a_career in entertainment from the_age of eight , and as a_child worked as an_amateur_dancer , performed on radio , and worked as a_model , before joining the_chorus of Billy_Rose 's_Diamond_Horseshoe in 1940 . There she met Gene_Kelly ; they were_married the_following_year , when she was seventeen_years old , and divorced sixteen_years later in 1957 . After work in the_theatre , Blair began her_film_career playing supporting_roles in films such_as A_Double_Life_(_1947_) and Another_Part of the_Forest ( 1948_) . Her_interest in Marxism led to an_investigation by the_House_Un-American_Activities_Committee_and_Blair was_blacklisted for some_time , but resumed her_career with a_critically_acclaimed_performance in Marty_(_1955_) for which she was_nominated for an_Academy_Award for Best_Supporting_Actress . She continued her_career with regular_theatre , film_and_television , mainly in Europe , work until the_mid-1990s .
